sn35.159:0.3: 159. Focus, the Exterior, and the End of Relishing
sn35.159:1.1: “Mendicants, properly attend to sights. Truly see the impermanence of sights.
sn35.159:1.2: When a mendicant does this, they grow disillusioned with sights.
sn35.159:1.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.159:1.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
